server.model.players

Class ActionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.players.ActionHandler

  • public class ActionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    ActionHandler controls all entity actions currently. Plan to port all of the actions done in this class to the region classes at AbstractLocations, and global actions (objects that may exist in numerous regions) are done in Python utilizing the Plugin.
    Author:
    Dennis
